DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to establish bioequivalence between two tablet formulations of idalopirdine
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study of Idalopirdine Tablets 60 mg
DOC.criteria: Healthy men and women ≥18 and ≤55 years of age body mass index (BMI) of >18.5 and <30 kg/m2 Pregnant and lactating women Other protocol defined inclusion and exclusion criteria may apply
